title: Why i have not get 400RP at level3?

replies.body: help,i want to buy some runes

You can't buy runes with RP, only IP, also you no longer receive the 400RP at lvl 3, instead you get a special hextech chest.

Also it's generally not worth it to buy tier 1/2 runes, you are better off waiting for tier 3.

Hey there,

With the introduction of hextech crafting the 400RP reward was removed.

See this thread for more information.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp
